name: Avocado Toast
description: Whole grain toast topped with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and feta cheese.

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: Scrambled eggs, black beans, cheese, and salsa wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla.

name: Veggie Wrap
description: Fresh vegetables, hummus, and feta cheese wrapped in a spinach tortilla.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and croutons with Caesar dressing.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Whole wheat pasta with seasonal vegetables in a light cream sauce.

name: Teriyaki Rice Bowl
description: Brown rice topped with teriyaki chicken or tofu and steamed vegetables.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Cold brewed coffee served over ice with your choice of milk.

name: Fruit Smoothie
description: Blend of seasonal fruits, yogurt, and honey.
